History

~~~~~~~

* Travis-CI passed on python 2.7 and 3.5
* 91% test coverage
* 1117 python statements

* Travis-CI passed on python 2.7 and 3.5
* 91% test coverage
* 1096 python statements

* Travis-CI passed on python 2.7 and 3.5
